page.title: 04RECREATION
page.content: RECREATION IN NORTHWICH IS VERY VARIED AND DEPENDS UPON INDIVIDUAL TASTES.IN THIS BLOCK THERE ARE FACILITIES FOR THE WHOLE COMMUNITY .THERE ARE PARKS, PLAYING FIELDS AND PLAYGROUNDS,AS WELL AS MORE NATURAL AREAS ALONG RIVER BANKS OR IN WOODLANDS WHERE PEOPLE CAN SPEND THEIR LEISURE TIME. THE PRESENCE OF THE RIVER WEAVER,THE RIVER DANE AND THE CANALS PROVIDE THE TOWN WITH READY MADE RECREATIONAL AREAS.THIS CAN BE SEEN IN THE NUMBER OF WATER BASED ACTIVITIES WHICH TAKE PLACE.FOR EXAMPLE,ROWING,FISHING AND CANOEING ARE IMPORTANT ACTIVITIES WHICH HAVE DEVELOPED AS THE WATERWAYS HAVE BEEN USED LESS FOR TRADE AND MORE FOR RECREATION.ALSO BEING A FLAT AREA, THE USE OF BICYCLES IS COMMON,AND CLUBS HAVE BEEN DEVELOPED.THUS,IN THIS BLOCK,RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES REFLECT THE PHYSICAL CONDITIONS WHICH EXIST.
